properties.title: Dinarpur Agriculture Land
properties.description: Prime agriculture land located in Dinarpur, directly on the Haridwar to Laksar highway via Juice Country. This 30 begha plot offers 0-distance access to the road, with 2.5 km of 6-lane and 5 km of 4-lane highway nearby. Ideal for development or farming investments.
properties.address: Dinarpur, Haridwar to Laksar Highway, Uttarakhand, India

properties.title: Ashram on Sanyas Road
properties.description: Ashram property located directly on Sanyas Road featuring 31 rooms and 1 spacious hall. Perfect for spiritual gatherings or guest accommodations. Walking distance to Ganga River, DPS School, and Daksh Temple. Just 0.5 km from the highway and near the main market and Pilot Baba Ashram.

properties.title: Trust Property in Raiwala
properties.description: Massive trust-owned land in Raiwala spanning 150 begha, with 142 begha registered and 8 begha within the boundary. Situated just 3 km from both the highway and the railway station. The area is suitable for institutional, educational, or large-scale development projects. Nearby CBSE 12th-grade schools add educational value to the region.
properties.address: Raiwala, near Railway Station & Highway, Uttarakhand, India

properties.title: Residential Plot near Haridwar
properties.description: Residential plot measuring 17x30 ft located just 200 meters from the railway station and around 1 km from the highway. The market is within walking distance, and Haridwar is only 5 km away. The nearby railway station is set to undergo expansion, adding further value to the property.
properties.address: Near Railway Station, Haridwar, Uttarakhand, India

agents.name: Raj Kumar
agents.title: Real Estate Agent
agents.bio: With over 5 years of experience in real estate, Raj has established himself as one of the top agents in the industry. His deep knowledge of the market and dedication to client satisfaction have earned his numerous accolades.

testimonials.name: James & Katherine Anderson
testimonials.text: Working with Luxury Estates to find our dream home was an exceptional experience. The team's attention to detail and understanding of our needs made the process smooth and enjoyable.

testimonials.name: Elizabeth Chen
testimonials.text: When selling my penthouse, I needed an agency that understood the unique value of my property. Luxury Estates exceeded my expectations with their marketing strategy and negotiation skills.

testimonials.name: David & Sophia Martinez
testimonials.text: As international buyers, we faced unique challenges in finding our perfect vacation home. The team at Luxury Estates guided us through every step with professionalism and expertise.
